US BANK HOLIDAY: February 19, 2024 – Incoming and outgoing USD payments paused
Bitstamp incoming and outgoing USD payments will be paused on Monday, February 19, 2024, due to a public holiday in the US.

Due to the upcoming public holiday (President’s Day) in the US on Monday, February 19, 2024, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing USD payments will not be available.

EUR SEPA transfers, GBP FPS transfers, credit card, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and PayPal transfers will remain unaffected.

If you need any help or additional information, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net. 

Happy President’s Day to our US customers!
